string.value: #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says there was something very valuable amongst the things she's lost. She says to go talk to #b#@1092002:##k in #bNautilus#k, but there is also something you need to do first.

#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says you must make something amazing for #b#@1092002:##k.
If you bring her the following materials, she promises to make something special for Baine.

#rPig Vein#k(a drop item from #rRibbon Pigs#k that can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.)
#rDark Wooden Board#k(a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.)
#rYoung Soul#k(a drop item of #rOrange Mushrooms#k.)

Report back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k after you collect all the items.
Talk to #b#@1092002:##k in #bNautilus#k to deliver #rKyrinvana's Guitar#k and ask about the #rLost Statue#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 4,500 #Wbasic# #i4032484:# #t4032484:# #c4032484# 1 Able to proceed to 'Commotion on the Ship, No More!' as next quest.

But #b#p1092002##k has been working many days and nights, so he's probably very tired.\n\nSo I'm thinking about making something to cheer him up. Will you do me a favor and bring me the materials I need to make the item?
A valuable item has gotten lost due to the ruckus of the Pigs.\nCould you go see #b#p1092002##k in the #bBasement#k and find out what it is?

Thanks for offering to help. What I need are the following.

5 #rPig Veins#k (a drop item from #rRibbon Pigs#k that can be easily found in #b#m100020000##k.)
2 #rDark Wooden Board#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.)
1 #rYoung Soul#k (a drop item from #rOrange Mushrooms#k.)

I'll make something incredible with the items you bring me.
Is that too much to ask? Let me know if you ever change your mind.
I know gathering all the materials wasn't easy. Nice job!
It's done! It's the #rKyrinvana's Guitar#k. Haha!
You must collect 5 #rPig Veins#k, 2 #rDark Wooden Boards#k, and 1 #rYoung Soul#k. Press on!
